How can I fix it? :P
I would just do 'sudo apt-get remove NAME_OF_IPOD_PACKAGE; sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg'
no guarantees that that will fix it.. but it's worth a shot...
that would remove the broken package and try reconfiguring X.
